name: dxos-bundle
description: a DXOS bundle that can be used in no-build environments
author: Andreas Rozek <a.rozek@gmx.de> (https://www.rozek.de/)

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && vite build --sourcemap true --assetsDir . && rm ./dist/index.html && mv ./dist/index.js ./dist/dxos-bundle.js && mv ./dist/index.js.map ./dist/dxos-bundle.js.map
